title: Mark Zuckerberg’s Instagram orders workers back to office 5 days per week
description: Mark Zuckerberg’s Instagram is requiring all of its US-based employees to return to the office five days per week, a company spokesperson confirmed on Tuesday.
content:
Mark Zuckerbergs Instagram is requiring all of its US-based employees to return to the office five days per week, a company spokesperson confirmed on Tuesday.
The five-day requirement takes effect o… [+1878 chars]
